definitions.text: something or someone that has suffered ruin or dilapidation
examples: the house was a wreck when they bought it
thanks to that quack I am a human wreck

definitions.text: an accident that destroys a ship at sea
a serious accident (usually involving one or more vehicles)
examples: they are still investigating the crash of the TWA plane

definitions.text: a ship that has been destroyed at sea

examples: The kid busted up the car
